attributes.title: Zybourne Clock: The Most Expensive Internet Joke Ever? - Dude Soup Podcast #262
attributes.description:
If you go to http://getquip.com/dude right now, you’ll get your first refill FREE.
If you visit http://expressvpn.com/dude right now, you can get an extra 3 months of ExpressVPN for free!
Get an extra $30 off any purchase of $399 or more at http://indochino.com when entering DUDE at checkout.

In 2003, a group of young. inexperienced game developers set out to make the greatest video game ever made: The Zybourne Clock. Alas, due to in-fighting and not actually knowing how to design a game, this dream was never fully realized, save some grammatically inferior scripts, fan art, and nods from the gaming community at large.  
Now, thanks to a shocking discovery in December 2019, the story of The Zybourne Clock is being retold by a new generation of edgelords. Enter Freddie Wong, keeper of lore and Internet memes and the proud owner of a rare piece of Zybourne Clock memorabilia, recently purchased at auction for a staggering $5,100.00 (real dollars not bitcoin). 
Join us, as we explore the epic game that never was, and meet the one man whose passion for The Zybourne Clock never stopped ticking. Also, we play "Am I the Asshole?"

Follow us on Twitter and IG:
https://twitter.com/jameswillems
https://twitter.com/adamkovic
http://twitter.com/elysewillems
http://twitter.com/fwong

Tshirts n stuff: https://store.roosterteeth.com/collections/funhaus
